## Data Flow

```
submit-testimonial.html
         â”‚
         â–¼
   testimonial-form.js
   â”Œâ”€ Character counter
   â”œâ”€ Mad Libs templates
   â”œâ”€ Preview
   â”œâ”€ Auto-save draft
   â””â”€ Formspree AJAX
         â”‚
         â–¼
    Formspree API
         â”‚
         â–¼
    Email to You
         â”‚
         â–¼
  [Manual Addition]
         â”‚
         â–¼
  testimonials.json
  â”Œâ”€ id: 1, 2, 3...
  â”œâ”€ quote: "..."
  â”œâ”€ author: "Name"
  â”œâ”€ role: "Title, Co"
  â”œâ”€ featured: true/false
  â”œâ”€ approved: true/false
  â””â”€ timestamp: ISO
         â”‚
         â–¼
     index.html
         â”‚
         â–¼
   testimonials.js
   â”Œâ”€ fetch('data/testimonials.json')
   â”œâ”€ filter(approved && featured)
   â”œâ”€ sort(by timestamp)
   â””â”€ render(to .testimonials)
         â”‚
         â–¼
    User Sees It! ğŸ‰

## File Dependencies

```

  â””â”€ loads: testimonials.js
      â””â”€ fetches: data/testimonials.json

  â”œâ”€ loads: testimonial-form.js
  â””â”€ posts to: formspree.io/f/xdkbdgae

  â””â”€ reads/edits: data/testimonials.json

  â””â”€ writes: data/testimonials.json

.github/workflows/*.yml
  â””â”€ triggers: .github/scripts/add-testimonial.js
      â””â”€ writes: data/testimonials.json
